amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds to be used to destroy or conceal physical and electronic records and documents related to the use of Federal agency resources in any action involving or relating to members of the Texas Legislature during the period beginning May 11, 2003 and ending May 16, 2003.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record of July 21, 2003.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
